mapper.select: SELECT RCT.*,ULV.ID_ULV,ULV.NAME_ULV,SLV.ID_SLV,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,BUM.ID_BUM,BUM.NAME_BUM FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT JOIN BU_MASTER_BUM BUM ON BUM.ID_BUM = RCT.ID_BUM_RCT WHERE RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT = #{recipientStatus}

SELECT RCT.*,ULV.ID_ULV,ULV.NAME_ULV,SLV.ID_SLV,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,BUM.ID_BUM,BUM.NAME_BUM FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT JOIN BU_MASTER_BUM BUM ON BUM.ID_BUM = RCT.ID_BUM_RCT WHERE RCT.CODE_RCT = #{code}

SELECT RCT.*,ULV.ID_ULV,ULV.NAME_ULV,SLV.ID_SLV,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,BUM.ID_BUM,BUM.NAME_BUM FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT JOIN BU_MASTER_BUM BUM ON BUM.ID_BUM = RCT.ID_BUM_RCT WHERE RCT.NAME_RCT = #{name}

select RHT.ID_RHT as 'id',RHT.ID_RCT_RHT as 'recipientId',RCT.NAME_RCT as 'name',RCT.CODE_RCT as 'code', RHT.ADDRESS_RHT as 'address',RHT.CITY_RHT as 'city',RHT.STATE_RHT as 'state',RHT.ZIP_RHT as 'zip',RHT.CFA_RHT as 'cfa', RHT.MOBILE_RHT as 'contact',SLV.NAME_SLV as 'status',RHT.REMARKS_RHT as 'remarks', RHT.STATUS_CHANGE_DATE_RHT as 'changedOnDate',RHT.UPDATED_BY_RHT as 'UserId',USR.NAME_USR as 'changedBy',RHT.ID_TEM_RHT as 'TeamId',TEM.NAME_TEM as 'Team',RHT.ID_DESG_ULV_RHT as 'DesignationId',ulv.NAME_ULV as 'Designaton' from RECIPIENT_MASTER_HISTORY_RHT RHT JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON RCT.ID_RCT = RHT.ID_RCT_RHT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RHT.ID_TEM_RHT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RHT.ID_DESG_ULV_RHT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RHT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RHT JOIN USER_MASTER_USR USR ON USR.ID_USR = RHT.UPDATED_BY_RHT WHERE ID_RCT_RHT = #{id}

SELECT RCT.*,ULV.ID_ULV,ULV.NAME_ULV,SLV.ID_SLV,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,BUM.ID_BUM,BUM.NAME_BUM FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT JOIN BU_MASTER_BUM BUM ON BUM.ID_BUM = RCT.ID_BUM_RCT WHERE RCT.ID_RCT = #{id}
